dialogue.message: Do you want to learn magic?

I'll teach you how to harness your inner Mana into powerful energy. All magic uses a magical conductor. Most of the times, this conductor is a staff, but it can be a book, a key, a potion, anything! The most basic conductor is the Copper Staff. Macklel can forge one for you.
Here, I'll forge a Copper Staff for you! And it's done! Jane will teach you how to use it.

You got the Copper Staff from Macklel? I'll teach you how to use it. In the top left corner you can see a purple bar. That is how much Mana you have. Every time you use the Copper Staff, your Mana will decrease by 3. Your Mana will regenerate slowly. The longer you don't use your Mana the faster it will regenerate. The Copper Staff is a basic staff that shoots a fireball.
dialogue.option1: Cool! I think I like magic!

dialogue.message: And always, if you need more help, just talk to me!
